path.description: The path at which to create the component file, relative to the current workspace. Default is a folder with the same name as the component in the project root.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the page?

pageId.description: The id of the action used to access the page.

iconClass.description: The class for the icon displayed on the page.

style.description: The file extension or preprocessor to use for style files, or 'none' to skip generating the style file.

entrypoint.description: Defines how the page will be available to the user.
entrypoint.x-prompt: How will the page be accessible?
